attributes.action: encourage debate on the health benefits of circumcision in the face of increasing evidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent scientific research suggests there are many health benefits from preventative circumcision of infants. Urinary tract infections are reduced, foreskin diseases avoided, transmission of sexual infections including HIV and cervical cancer (wart) virus is much reduced, and nursing care in old age facilitated. There should be information and surgery available for those considering circumcision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
